page.title: 05Parkwood Estate.
page.content: At the back of school there are lots of courts. They have little parks with a climbing frame and a swing. There is a fence and some poplar trees that separate the school from them. There is a gate which people can get through when they come to school. The courts are a new development. Most of the dwellings are flats, some are bungalows, others are terraced houses. (They have 'cupboards' outside for the bins.) There are now many courts on the estate. Each has a small road with courts leading off. Usually you have six to eight courts to a road. There is plenty of space for cars to park.
